original_text: And the king of Egypt made Eliakim his brother king over Judah and Jerusalem, and turned his name to Jehoiakim. And Necho took Jehoahaz his brother, and carried him to Egypt.
korean_text: 애굽 왕 느고가 또 그의 형제 엘리아김을 세워 유다와 예루살렘 왕으로 삼고 그의 이름을 고쳐 여호야김이라 하고 그의 형제 여호아하스를 애굽으로 잡아갔더라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Egypt made Eliakim his brother
and turned his name to Jehoiakim
And Necho took Jehoahaz his brother
